description: experienced in building secure, scalable, and performant web applications.
Proficient in React, Next.js, Node.js, Django, and FastAPI, along with SQL and NoSQL databases.
Skilled in implementing authentication, authorization, and AI integration in production-ready apps.
Hands-on with frontend frameworks, backend APIs, databases, containerization, and automated testing.
Deployed applications to AWS and other platforms via CI/CD pipelines, integrating automated tests.
Familiar with agile practices and tools like JIRA and GitHub Projects, with basic Scrum exposure.
Adaptable to new frameworks, tools, and workflows.
